Laguarde: The scent of perfume was a signal for Kanis's dog. After picking up the scent, it would carry the goods to Kanis. Of course, this had to be done while Elbird was away from his cell. Gumshoe: I'm surprised he never found out about it, pal. Laguarde: We have a strict timetable here at the prison. Meal time, exercise time... It's easy to know when he's away from his cell. Edgeworth: (So, having full knowledge of the prison's inner workings, she made the deliveries herself. This would have ensured there were no slip-ups.) Laguarde: Franky would turn the breakers back on in the early morning, and the delivery was complete. I then modified the timestamp on the security camera. Gavèlle: You have told us a great deal. Edgeworth: Ngh.....! Gavèlle: The Defense rests, I see. In that case, court is adjourned. Kay: Mr. Edgeworth! Isn't there anything we can do? Edgeworth: (What should I do? Gavèlle: That's right, you're the defense attorney in charge of this case, aren't you? Ray: Exactly! Did you all forget? That's so mean. Edgeworth: (Booking... that's the process one undergoes before being locked up in the detention center.) It sounds like you don't really know a lot about Knightley. Laguarde: I only know a little. Laguarde: I'm just kidding. I'll continue. Add statements: "Perhaps he used the chisel hidden in the chessboard?" and "I'm sure it would have been a simple "job"." Edgeworth: Edgeworth: The chessboard...? Laguarde: The thing that the victim brought with him. It seemed like he really enjoyed playing chess. Edgeworth: Edgeworth: You certainly seem to hold strong feelings towards Kanis. Laguarde: Th-That's... just natural. Remember my interrogations? Characters:
Character 0
Name: Kay Faraday
Description: A self-styled Great Thief and so-called "second Yatagarasu" who's always looking to bag the greatest treasure of all -- the truth.
Character 1
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Homicide detective from the local precinct who's always first on the scene at any murder investigation.
Character 2
Name: Bronco Knight
Description: A former bodyguard who killed his team leader. He is set to stand trial soon.
Character 3
Name: Eddie Fender
Description: A defense attorney I have known for a long time, but haven't seen in years. Apparently, he lived abroad for a while.
Character 4
Name: Rocco Carcerato
Description: An inmate and former boxer who is obsessed with training. Has a pet polar bear named Teddy.
Character 5
Name: Verity Gavèlle
Description: A district court judge and member of the Committee for Prosecutorial Excellence, who also acts as its mouthpiece.
Character 6
Name: Eustace Winner
Description: A rookie prosecutor who's taken over my cases on the Committee's orders.
Character 7
Name: Simeon Saint
Description: The suspect in this case. A timid young man who seems an unlikely murderer.
Character 8
Name: Fifi Laguarde
Description: Warden of the prison. An animal lover who considers physical contact to be very important.
Character 9
Name: Frank Sahwit
Description: The prison inmate who first discovered the body. Currently training to be a pet stylist.
Character 10
Name: Bodhidharma Kanis
Description: A blind ex-assassin whose favored tools were a black dog and a knife. The tinkling of small bells used to accompany his appearance.
Character 11
Name: Shi-Long Lang
Description: An Interpol agent with an unrivaled arrest rate. Originally from Zheng Fa.
Character 12
Name: Regina Berry
Description: Head animal trainer at the Berry Big Circus, and Saint's boss.
